overview: Over the past 8 years, Mark Abdel has sold more than 250 homes throughout the greater Minneapolis and St. Paul area. His expertise, negotiation skills and intimate knowledge of the local real estate market has elevated him to be one of the top ten transactional agents for the last few years. As an active member in his church, an avid restorer of homes, community volunteer and Minnesota Real Estate Investors Association member, Mark Abdel serves the same community he does business in.
